author: simonetripodi
msg: enlisted all binaries artifacts have to be dowloaded from Nexus to be uploaded in the bin mirror

author: rhuijben
msg: Ensure that we don't set an operation on a conflict skel twice, by asserting
that no operation is set before storing the operation details.
returns NULL before setting the operation.

author: rhs
msg: added names to messengers; fixed addressing a bit; added server/client example

author: rhuijben
msg: Implement serializing text conflicts following the conflict-storage-2.0 model.
Extend the model to also store an original-theirs value, like how we handle
properties. We have the information available and there might be third party
tools that can use the information to help in resolving conflicts.
(test_serialize_text_conflict): New function to test text conflicts.

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-4398] Updating HTTPConduit to check 303, patch from Fred B applied
